paragraphs.content: Psalm 147
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 147

paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.

paragraphs.content: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.

paragraphs.content: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

paragraphs.content: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.

paragraphs.content: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.

paragraphs.content: The LORD lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.

paragraphs.content: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sing unto the Lord with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:

paragraphs.content: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.

paragraphs.content: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.

paragraphs.content: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.

paragraphs.content: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.

paragraphs.content: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise the Lord, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.

paragraphs.content: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.

paragraphs.content: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.

paragraphs.content: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.

paragraphs.content: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.

paragraphs.content: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?
paragraphs.contentHtml: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?

paragraphs.content: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.

paragraphs.content: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.

paragraphs.content: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the Lord.
